channel.title: Aboutmes on Yiyuan Fang's Stuff

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I am Yiyuan. I am interested in evolutionry biology, good writing of all genres, and computer science. I am a 1st-year master’s student at EPFL in Switzerland. I graduated from Yale College in 2021 where I majored in Ecology and Evolutionary Biology. Things I do for fun: snowboarding/skiing, guitar, trail running, figure skating, badminton (not so much due to rotator cuff injuries). An active life outdoors is a life worth living.
